Changelog
=========

0.2.0 (2014-12-01)
------------------

- Switched to new embed mode (using ``iframe``)
  [keul]
- Video provided in https
  [keul]
- Plone 4.3 compatibility
  [keul]
- Autoplay feature added
  [keul]

0.1.0 (2011-08-31)
------------------

- Initial release (moved out from ``redturtle.video``)
